fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on spending ₹10 lakhs in a card anniversary year

rewards.name: ICICI Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 6 Reward Points per ₹200 spent (3% value back at 1:1 redemption for travel/vouchers)
rewards.joiningBonus: 12,500 Reward Points + Taj Epicure Preferred Membership (1 year) + EazyDiner Prime Membership (renewed annually)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Rent, Tax, Government Services, E-Wallet Loads

calculator.specialLogic: 6X rewards on flights/vouchers (18% value) and 12X rewards on hotel bookings (36% value) via iShop. Category caps: Grocery ₹40,000/month, Utilities ₹80,000/month, Insurance ₹80,000/month, Education ₹80,000/month

travel.label: 3% base; up to 36% via iShop hotels

redemption.bestOption: Redeem for flights, hotels via iShop or select brand vouchers (Apple, Tanishq, Tumi, Coach) for 1 RP = ₹1

golf.text: Unlimited complimentary golf rounds/lessons via Golftripz

movies.text: BOGO on BookMyShow up to ₹750 off on second ticket, 2 times per month

metadata.bestFor: High spenders seeking premium travel benefits, unlimited lounge access for entire family, and excellent 3% reward rates
metadata.verdict: ICICI's flagship super-premium card competing with HDFC Infinia, offering exceptional 3% rewards with 1:1 redemption and unlimited lounge access for both primary and add-on cardholders.
pros: Excellent 3% reward rate with 1:1 redemption for travel/vouchers
Unlimited domestic + international lounge for primary and add-on
Up to 36% value back on hotel bookings via iShop
Includes utilities, insurance, education in rewards program
cons: Best redemption (1:1) limited to travel and select vouchers
No direct airline mile transfer partners
Statement credit redemption at poor 0.40 value

fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on spending ₹10 lakhs in a year

rewards.name: ICICI Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 4 RP per ₹100 on retail, 1 RP per ₹100 on utilities/insurance (1% value back at 0.25 redemption)
rewards.joiningBonus: ₹5,000 Tata CLiQ voucher (American Express variant only, as birthday benefit)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Rent, Tax, Government Services, E-Wallet Loads

calculator.specialLogic: 4 RP per ₹100 on retail, 1 RP per ₹100 on utilities/insurance. Accelerated rewards via iShop. Category caps: Utilities ₹80,000/month, Insurance ₹80,000/month, Grocery ₹40,000/month

redemption.bestOption: Redeem for e-vouchers (Tanishq, Marriott, Croma, Amazon) at 1 RP = ₹0.25

golf.text: 1 complimentary golf round/lesson per ₹50,000 spent in previous month (max 4 per month)

movies.text: BOGO on BookMyShow up to ₹750 off on second ticket, 4 times per month

metadata.bestFor: High spenders who want unlimited lounge access and lifestyle benefits without the Metal card's invite-only restriction
metadata.verdict: A solid super-premium card with excellent lounge benefits and 4 BookMyShow offers monthly, but underwhelming 1% reward rate compared to the Private Metal variant.
pros: Unlimited domestic and international lounge access
4 BookMyShow BOGO offers per month (best among ICICI cards)
cons: Low reward rate of just 1% value back
Add-on cards don't get lounge access
High annual fee of ₹12,000 for the rewards offered
Redemption value stuck at ₹0.25 per point

metadata.bestFor: Frequent travelers and lifestyle spenders who can maximize the welcome vouchers and milestone benefits
metadata.verdict: A well-rounded premium card with excellent welcome benefits worth double the joining fee, ideal for those who can meet the ₹6L spend threshold for fee waiver.
pros: Welcome vouchers worth ₹13,000+ exceed joining fee of ₹6,500
Up to 20,000 milestone reward points annually

metadata.verdict: A solid mid-tier card with welcome vouchers exceeding the joining fee, ideal for those who can't meet the higher Sapphiro spend thresholds.
pros: Welcome vouchers worth ₹5,250+ exceed joining fee
Up to 15,000 milestone reward points annually
Airport + Railway lounge access (8 railway visits/year)

metadata.bestFor: Credit card beginners and low-to-moderate spenders who want basic benefits at a low annual fee
metadata.verdict: A good entry-level card for building credit history with essential benefits like movie discounts and lounge access at an affordable ₹500 annual fee.
pros: Up to 10,000 milestone reward points annually

name: ICICI Manchester United Signature Credit Card

fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on spending ₹2.5 lakhs in a year

rewards.name: ICICI Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 3 RP per ₹100 domestic, 4 RP per ₹100 international, 5 RP per ₹100 on Man Utd match days
rewards.joiningBonus: Manchester United branded holdall (duffel bag) and football
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Rent, Tax, Government Services, E-Wallet Loads

calculator.specialLogic: 5 RP per ₹100 on Manchester United match days (1.25% value), 4 RP per ₹100 international (1%), 3 RP per ₹100 domestic (0.75%)

redemption.bestOption: Redeem for e-vouchers or Manchester United merchandise

milestones.benefit: Top monthly spender: Signed Man Utd jersey + match ticket
Top 70 spenders: Man Utd branded shirt monthly
Top 18 spenders: Fully paid Manchester United Experience (stadium tour, training session, megastore visit)

movies.text: 25% off (max ₹150) on min 2 tickets on BookMyShow & INOX, 2 times per month

metadata.bestFor: Die-hard Manchester United fans who want exclusive club merchandise and once-in-a-lifetime experiences
metadata.verdict: A must-have for Manchester United fans with unique club experiences and merchandise, but average for non-fans due to modest reward rates.
pros: Exclusive Man Utd merchandise as welcome gift
Chance to win fully-paid Manchester United Experience
10-20% discounts at Old Trafford and Man Utd megastore
Top spenders get signed jerseys and match tickets
Better base reward rate (0.75%) than Coral
cons: Benefits primarily appeal to Man Utd fans only
Low base reward rate for non-fans
Competition-based rewards favor only top spenders nationwide

fees.waiverText: Lifetime free - no joining or annual fee

calculator.specialLogic: Category caps: Utilities ₹40,000/month, Insurance ₹40,000/month, Grocery ₹20,000/month. No milestone benefits

metadata.bestFor: First-time credit card users looking to build credit history with absolutely zero annual fee
metadata.verdict: The best option for credit beginners - a truly lifetime free card with basic rewards, EMV chip security, and dining discounts, though lacking premium benefits.
pros: Lifetime free - zero joining and annual fee forever
Easiest eligibility criteria among ICICI cards
Up to 15% dining discounts via Culinary Treats
